backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing schools, staff, reports, and user roles with stable storage, upgrade hooks, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature that adds a password gate to the admin route and the files it touches.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend file purposes used as reference for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation outlining features, setup, and roles for the Inkog reporting system.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration and sets dark mode on load.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component displaying accessâ€‘denied messaging with optional diagnostic details and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Password gate component validating a hardcoded admin access password before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/admin/SchoolForm: Dialog form for creating or editing school records using admin mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/StaffFormD: Modal form for creating or updating staff accounts with fields for principal, name, email, school, and enabled state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGateErr: Displays an error card when authorization fails, with diagnostics, retry, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ShowPrincip: Button that opens a dialog showing the authenticated user's principal with copy-to-clipboard support.
App layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportSt: Dropdown actions allowing staff to change a report's status to reviewed or resolved.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-related hooks for CRUD operations on schools and staff accounts using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDiagnostics.t: Fetches backend admin diagnostics such as principal, roles, and permission flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Handles authentication state, admin/staff role checks, and exposes related loading and error information.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient with custom initialization and state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSchools.ts: Fetches the list of schools using the actor via react-query. Disabled until the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaffReports.ts: Gets reports for a given school and provides a mutation to update report status, with cache invalidation. Uses react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudentReport.ts: Submits an anonymous student report and invalidates school stats cache on success. Wraps backend calls in a react-query mutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the root stylesheet by importing the parent index.css file.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App. Imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for managing schools, staff, and viewing stats, with editing and deletion dialogs. Integrates multiple admin-related hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AdminGatePage.tsx: Controls admin access through password verification, authentication, authorization, and diagnostics before showing the dashboard. Displays appropriate UI for loading, errors, or denied access.
frontend/src/pages/EntryPage.tsx: Landing page letting users choose between student, staff, or admin roles. Provides navigation cards with descriptions and calls to action.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboardPage.ts: Displays staff-specific report management with filtering, stats, and status updates. Uses staff authentication and report fetching hooks.
frontend/src/pages/StaffGatePage.tsx: Handles staff authentication and authorization flow, showing login, loading, error, disabled-account, or staff dashboard screens based on auth state.
frontend/src/pages/StudentReportPage.tsx: Provides a form for students to anonymously submit reports with school selection, category, and text, handling submission state and success feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, feature requests, and notes related to implementing a password-gated admin page.
